AS I WILL NO LONGER BE MONITORING THIS TORRENT BUT WILLING TO SOLVE POSSIBLE ERRORS SOME OF YOU MAY HAVE, BEFORE REINSTALLING YOUR WINDOWS, PLEASE CONSIDER TO:

- empty temp folders, you may use Ccleaner
- clean registry, you may use: CCleaner, Registry Mechanic, Wise registry Cleaner,  Argente Registry Cleaner ...so on
- use administrative privileges to run installer (vista, win7,8 users)
- update DirectX and video drivers (although some older video cards are not supported by this game)
- extract it where you want and run it directly from there...
